Package assegnamento3.src

Interface Observer

All Known Implementing Classes:
Customer, Seller
public interface Observer
The Observer interface is used to implement the Observer Design Pattern.

Client and Seller implement the Interface to enable the receipt of notifications.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteMessage​(int id)
    Deletes a specific message given by id.
    void deleteMessages()
    Clears all messages.
    void displayMessages()
    Prints to the standard output the messages' list.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMessageList()
    Returns the messages as a list.
    java.lang.String getMessages()
    Returns the string representation of all the messages.
    void newMessage​(java.lang.String m)
    Adds a new message to the list.

  • Method Details

    • displayMessages

      void displayMessages()
      Prints to the standard output the messages' list.

    • deleteMessages

      void deleteMessages()
      Clears all messages.

    • newMessage

      void newMessage​(java.lang.String m)
      Adds a new message to the list.
      Parameters:
      m - the message.

    • getMessages

      java.lang.String getMessages()
      Returns the string representation of all the messages. Each message is on a new line.
      Returns:
      messages as a single String

    • deleteMessage

      void deleteMessage​(int id)
      Deletes a specific message given by id.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the message to be removed

    • getMessageList

      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMessageList()
      Returns the messages as a list.
      Returns:
      message list
